ai_explanation.introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is てきど which you will often hear in contexts like giving advice on portions, exercise routines, or even talking about stress levels. For example, you might say "運動は適度に" which means "exercise in moderation."
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word "てきど" means a suitable amount or moderate level of something, not too much and not too little, but just right.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

examples.kanji: あの人とは適度な距離を保ちましょう。
examples.furigana: あの人(ひと)とは適度(てきど)な距離(きょり)を保(たも)ちましょう。

translations.EN: Let's keep a moderate distance from that person.
translations.ID: Mari kita jaga jarak yang wajar dari orang itu.
translations.ES: Mantengamos una distancia moderada de esa persona.
translations.VI: Hãy giữ khoảng cách vừa phải với người đó.
translations.FR: Gardons une distance modérée par rapport à cette personne.
translations.BN: চলুন সেই ব্যক্তির থেকে একটি উপযুক্ত দূরত্ব বজায় রাখি।
translations.ZH: 与那个人保持适当的距离吧。
translations.TL: Tayo'y magpanatili ng tamang layo mula sa taong iyon.
translations.MY: အဲဒီလူနဲ့ လိုက်ဖက်တဲ့အကွာအဝေးကို တည်ရှိစေကြစို့။
translations.HI: उस व्यक्ति से कुछ दूरी बनाए रखें।
translations.AR: دعونا نحافظ على مسافة معتدلة من هذا الشخص.
translations.FA: بیایید فاصله مناسب را از آن شخص حفظ کنیم.

examples.kanji: 適度な食事が大切です。
examples.furigana: 適度(てきど)な食事(しょくじ)が大切(たいせつ)です。

translations.ID: Makan dalam porsi moderat itu penting.
translations.VI: Bữa ăn điều độ rất quan trọng.
translations.MY: ပုံမှန်ထမင်းစာကျွေးဖို့ကအရေးကြီးပါတယ်။
translations.FA: وعده های غذایی متعادل مهم هستند.

examples.kanji: 適度な運動は健康に良いです。
examples.furigana: 適度(てきど)な運動(うんどう)は健康(けんこう)に良(よ)いです。

translations.EN: Moderate exercise is good for health.
translations.ID: Olahraga yang moderat baik untuk kesehatan.
translations.ES: El ejercicio moderado es bueno para la salud.
translations.VI: Tập thể dục điều độ rất tốt cho sức khỏe.
translations.FR: L'exercice modéré est bon pour la santé.
translations.NE: मध्यम व्यायाम स्वास्थ्यको लागि राम्रो हुन्छ।
translations.ZH: 适度的运动对健康有益。
translations.TL: Ang katamtamang ehersisyo ay mabuti para sa kalusugan.
translations.MY: အသင့်အတင့်လှုပ်ရှားမှုသည် ကျန်းမာမှုအတွက် ကောင်းৰကပါတယ်။
translations.HI: उचित व्यायाम स्वास्थ्य के लिए अच्छा होता है।
translations.FA: ورزش معتدل برای سلامتی مفید است.

examples.kanji: 適度な休みが必要です。
examples.furigana: 適度(てきど)な休(やす)みが必要(ひつよう)です。

translations.EN: A moderate amount of rest is necessary.
translations.VI: Nghỉ ngơi hợp lý là cần thiết.
translations.TL: Ang katamtaman na pahinga ay kinakailangan.
translations.MY: နားချိန်အဆင်ပြေတဲ့အချိန် လိုအပ်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: उचित मात्रा में आराम आवश्यक है।

synonyms: 適切 : てきせつ : appropriate
程良い : ほどよい : moderate
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word 'てきど' are 'てきせつ' and 'ほどよい'. 'てきせつ' highlights more appropriateness in terms of a particular situation, whereas 'ほどよい' suggests a sense of balance or just right in quantity or level.
antonyms: 過剰 : かじょう : excess
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word 'てきど' are 'かじょう' and 'ふそく'. 'かじょう' refers to an excessive amount, unlike 'てきど', which is moderate. 'ふそく' means a lack or deficiency, contrasting with 'てきど', which indicates a sufficient level.

parts_of_speech: Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
